subject: #SSN6054 NO Tracking No.
description_text:
Hello, 

Can you please help me with a tracking number for this order. 
Thanks.+40784845249

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexandru Cosma,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
